title: His Holiday Gift
description: Julian hadn't seen the young girl who had stolen his heart as a boy, since he was fifteen years old. Now this year as the holidays approach, he can't seem to shake the memories of the fair Christina. She haunts his dreams and follows him into the waking hours. Forsaking family and friends, he deciders to head to the picturesque mountains where of Colorado where he first met her. Maybe there he can make peace with the past and move on.
author: Jordan Silver
